actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Public Works, S. Rept. 93-291.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 93-369.

official_title: A resolution authorizing supplemental expenditures by the Committee on Public Works for inquiries and investigations.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Increases to $1,140,000 (now $625,000) the amount to be expended by the Senate Committee on Public Works for investigations within its jurisdiction pursuant to S. Res. 21, 93rd Congress.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing supplemental expenditures by the Committee on Public Works for inquiries and investigations.
